wikitext.*:
<noinclude>Only for [[Teemo]]</noinclude><includeonly><!--{if !isset($wgTeemo) || !$wgTeemo}--><!--{assign var="wgTeemo" value=true scope="global"}--><style>
#mw-content-text.teemo {
    transition: .37s opacity linear;
    opacity: 1;
}

#mw-content-text.teemo.stealth {
    opacity: 0;
}

.TeemoStealth.cilent-js {
    display: block!important;
}

.TeemoStealth.cilent-js .TeemoButton {
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: .37s all linear;
}

.TeemoButton.off {
    -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
    -moz-filter: grayscale(100%);
    -ms-filter: grayscale(100%);
    -o-filter: grayscale(100%);
    filter: grayscale(100%);
    filter: gray;
}
</style>
<script type="text/javascript">
window.RLQ = window.RLQ || [];
window.RLQ.push(function() {
    mw.loader.implement('widgetTeemo', function () {
        if (window.navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase().indexOf('mobile') == -1 && $('.skin-vector')[0]) $(function() {
            var content = $('#mw-content-text').addClass('teemo'),
                counter = 0,
                on_off = false,
                temp = {},
                timeOut = 73,
                mouseX, mouseY;
            temp.cleanState = function(e) {
                if (e.pageX - mouseX > 7 || e.pageY - mouseY > 7) {
                    if (on_off) {
                        counter = 0;
                        content.removeClass('stealth');
                    }
                }
                temp.mouseX = e.pageX;
                temp.mouseY = e.pageY;
            }
            $(document).bind('mousemove', temp.cleanState);
            window.setInterval(function() {
                if (on_off) {
                    if (counter > 2000) content.addClass('stealth');
                    else counter += timeOut;
                } else {
                    counter = 0;
                    content.removeClass('stealth');
                }
                mouseX = temp.mouseX;
                mouseY = temp.mouseY;
            }, timeOut);
            $('.TeemoStealth').appendTo('body').addClass('cilent-js').find('.TeemoButton').bind('click', function() {
                var textNode = $('.TeemoText'),
                    dataset = textNode[0].dataset;
                if (on_off) {
                    on_off = false;
                    textNode.text(dataset.on);
                    $(this).removeClass('off');
                } else {
                    on_off = true;
                    $('.TeemoText').text(dataset.off);
                    $(this).addClass('off');
                }
            }).click();
        });
    });
});
</script><!--{/if}--></includeonly>
